Constructor Detail

KeywordSentimentAnalyzer

public KeywordSentimentAnalyzer(java.io.File multiDefFile)
                         throws java.io.IOException
Load with a multi-term finder (mtf) definition file.

Mtf definition file is assumed to be of the form: %(or 0 1 2) #Terms 0: positive terms $caseInsensitive full \@positive-terms-file-name.txt #Terms 1: negative terms $caseInsensitive full \@negative-terms-file-name.txt #Terms 2: neutral terms $caseInsensitive full \@neutral-terms-file-name.txt #Terms 3: negating terms $caseInsensitive full \@negating-terms-file-name.txt NOTE: If a different format for the definition file is used, then a mapping from terms index number to sentiment type will need to be supplied!

Throws:
java.io.IOException
Method Detail

getSentiment

public Sentiment getSentiment(java.lang.String textString,
                              TopicSplitter topicSplitter)
Get the sentiment expressed in the non-topic strings about the topic strings according to the topicSplitter.

If the topicSplitter is null, then compute a general sentiment for the textString as a whole.

Specified by:
getSentiment in interface SentimentAnalyzer

getSentiment

public Sentiment getSentiment(java.lang.String[] textStrings)
Get the sentiment expressed in the non-topic (ODD-indexed) strings about the topic (EVEN-indexed) strings.

Specified by:
getSentiment in interface SentimentAnalyzer
